title: What is the syntax for declaring a variable in JavaScript?

What does the keyword 'this' refer to in JavaScript?
answer_2: The function where it is called
answer_3: The object that is calling the function
answer_4: The parent object of the current object
right_answer: The object that is calling the function

title: What is the purpose of a 'for' loop in JavaScript?
answer_1: To execute a block of code while a condition is true
answer_2: To execute a block of code a specific number of times
answer_3: To execute a block of code until a condition is true
answer_4: To execute a block of code asynchronously
right_answer: To execute a block of code a specific number of times

title: Which keyword is used to declare a function in JavaScript?
What is the purpose of the 'setTimeout' method in JavaScript?
answer_1: To set a delay before executing a function
answer_3: To set an interval for executing a function
answer_4: To pause the execution of a function
right_answer: To set a delay before executing a function

title: What is the result of the expression '5 == '5'' in JavaScript?
What is the purpose of the 'break' statement in a JavaScript loop?
answer_2: To skip the current iteration of the loop
answer_3: To continue to the next iteration of the loop
